channel.title: Objective C on Mudox
channel.description: Recent content in Objective C on Mudox

item.title: My iOS Awesome List
item.description: Testing Nimble Matcher library that replaces XCTest `XCTAssert` family. RxNimble Simplify expectation matching for RxBlocking. RxSwift RxSwift testing framework, testing `Observable` operators, bundled with [RxSwift]. OHHTTPStub Network stubbing library. SwiftCheck QuickCheck for Swift. Swinject Dependency injection framework for Swift with iOS/macOS/Linux. EarlGrey iOS UI Automation Test Framework. iOSSnapshotTestCase Presentation test based on Image diff.
